column5: Looking at the Lake Superior MODIS imagery, it's obvious there is a big tongue of open water coming in to the bay. My question: most of the shoreline east of town looks like open water too, is it? How much ice is there? Lambert Island area? Thanks again, we usually come up in late March for a little Laker fishing.
http://fishingboard.thunderbayfishing.com/index.php These guys will be able to answer your question
